item.description: On Friday, February 4th, 2011, the BCAE will open the "Art Everywhere Gallery"- a new gallery space showcasing local artists. Works by select artists will be on rotating display (approximately every four months) and for sale at the BCAE. The gallery will link the work of local artists to the Boston arts community and visitors of the BCAE. Guests of the gallery can simply check-in at the front desk anytime Monday to Friday from 9am to 5pm. The first installation of artists include: oil painter, Marian Dioguardi of the South End and Jacob Higginbottom, watercolor & mixed media artist of Boston, MA. Join the BCAE on February 4th 2011, from 6PM to 8PM for the grand opening celebration of the new gallery with a ribbon cutting ceremony as well as complimentary wine and hors d'oeuvres. The opening celebration is free and open to the public. RSVP is necessary. Please visit www.bcae.org or call the BCAE at 617-267-4430 to sign up. Free to the public.

group.name: The Boston Graphic Design Meetup Group

item.name: Free Art Gallery for Local Artists Opens Doors!
